publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2908 Dr Richard Simpson: Model Alcohol Workplace Policy—That the Parliament welcomes the publication of a model alcohol policy for the workplace developed by the Scottish Government and Alcohol Industry Partnership in conjunction with the Scottish Centre for Healthy Working Lives and hopes that all employers will adopt this or similar policies to help in changing the culture and attitudes towards alcohol in Scotland.
S3M-2908 Model Alcohol Workplace Policy (lodged on 18 November 2008) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2908 Dr Richard Simpson: Model Alcohol Workplace Policy—That the Parliament welcomes the publication of a model alcohol policy for the workplace developed by the Scottish Government and Alcohol Industry Partnership in conjunction with the Scottish Centre for Healthy Working Lives and hopes that all employers will adopt this or similar policies to help in changing the culture and attitudes towards alcohol in Scotland. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
S3M-2908 Model Alcohol Workplace Policy (lodged on 18 November 2008) Jack McConnell*

S3M-2908 Model Alcohol Workplace Policy (lodged on 18 November 2008) Marlyn Glen*, Bill Kidd*, Ross Finnie*, Jackson Carlaw*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Robin Harper*, Elaine Murray*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Rhona Brankin*, James Kelly*, Brian Adam*, Andy Kerr*, Kenneth Gibson*, Karen Whitefield*, Bob Doris*, Ian McKee*, Gil Paterson*, Hugh Henry*, Mary Mulligan*, Des McNulty*, Trish Godman*, Dave Thompson*
S3M-2908 Model Alcohol Workplace Policy (lodged on 18 November 2008) John Park*, Jackie Baillie*, Peter Peacock*
S3M-2908 Model Alcohol Workplace Policy (lodged on 18 November 2008) Angela Constance*
S3M-2908 Model Alcohol Workplace Policy (lodged on 18 November 2008) Cathie Craigie*
S3M-2908 Model Alcohol Workplace Policy (lodged on 18 November 2008) Cathy Peattie*
